an5.84:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti, amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.84:1.3: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappi hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti—
an5.84:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.84:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.84:2.3: Saddho hoti, hirima hoti, ottappi hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti—
an5.84:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
